mapper.insert: insert into admin_account (admin_id, username, password, owner, permission, created_at, updated_at) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update admin_account set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, username, password, owner, permission, created_at, updated_at from admin_account
